channel.title: How do i edit qest menus?
channel.description: where r the quest menus located?

item.title: How do i edit qest menus?
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

they are in client.java i think
just search for what you want to change…
Ex: //quest 1 - invisible armour - @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ if(Killedqueen == true && q1stage == 3) { q1stage = 4; } if(Guard == 2) { guardsdead = true; } if(guardsdead == false && (absX == 2790 || absX == 2791) && absY == 10216) { sendMessage("The guards kick you out the way."); teleportToX = 2790; teleportToY = 10214; } //end of quest 1 - invisible armour - @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

that is the standard quest menu…just change want u want basically

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit qest menus?
